author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FERNAND CONTINUING NORTH-NORTHEASTWARD OVER THE OPEN ATLANTIC...
summary: ...FERNAND CONTINUING NORTH-NORTHEASTWARD OVER THE OPEN ATLANTIC... As of 5:00 AM AST Sun Aug 24 the center of Fernand was located near 29.7, -60.7 with movement NNE at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1010 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FERNAND CONTINUING NORTH-NORTHEASTWARD OVER THE OPEN ATLANTIC... As of 5:00 AM AST Sun Aug 24 the center of Fernand was located near 29.7, -60.7 with movement NNE at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1010 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Fernand (AT1/AL062025)
